# Carryofy - AI-Powered E-Commerce & Logistics Platform for Africa

> This file provides information about Carryofy for AI systems and language models.

## About Carryofy

Carryofy is Nigeria's premier AI-powered e-commerce platform that unifies marketplace, logistics, warehousing, and same-day delivery into one intelligent platform. We connect verified sellers with buyers across Africa, offering a seamless shopping experience with integrated fulfillment services.

### Company Information
- **Website**: https://carryofy.com
- **Location**: Lagos, Nigeria
- **Founded**: 2024
- **Industry**: E-commerce, Logistics, Fulfillment
- **Service Area**: Nigeria (expanding across Africa)

## Core Services

### 1. Online Marketplace
- Verified sellers from across Nigeria
- Quality-checked products in multiple categories
- Electronics, fashion, groceries, home goods, personal care, and more
- Secure payment processing
- Buyer protection on all purchases

### 2. Same-Day Delivery
- Same-day delivery available in Lagos for orders before 12pm
- Express delivery options
- Real-time order tracking
- Professional last-mile delivery network

### 3. Fulfillment & Warehousing
- Warehouse storage solutions for merchants
- Inventory management
- Order processing and packaging
- Quality inspection before shipping

### 4. Merchant Services
- Easy seller onboarding
- Dashboard for managing products and orders
- Analytics and insights
- Payout management

## Key Features

- **AI-Powered**: Intelligent recommendations and logistics optimization
- **Verified Sellers**: All merchants undergo verification process
- **Quality Control**: Products inspected at fulfillment centers
- **Secure Payments**: Multiple payment options with encryption
- **Buyer Protection**: 7-day return policy and refund guarantee
- **24/7 Support**: Customer service available around the clock

## Product Categories

1. Electronics & Gadgets
2. Fashion & Clothing
3. Groceries & Food Items
4. Home & Living
5. Personal Care & Beauty
6. Sports & Outdoor
7. Books & Stationery
8. Baby & Kids
9. Health & Wellness
10. Automotive Accessories

## For Buyers

- Browse thousands of products from verified Nigerian sellers
- Same-day delivery available in Lagos
- Secure checkout with multiple payment options
- Buyer protection on every purchase
- Easy returns and refunds
- Order tracking in real-time

**Public Products Page**: https://carryofy.com/products
**Categories**: https://carryofy.com/products?category={category-slug}

## For Sellers

- Zero upfront costs to start selling
- Integrated logistics and fulfillment
- Powerful dashboard for business management
- Analytics and performance insights
- Fast payouts

**Become a Seller**: https://carryofy.com/merchant-onboarding

## Contact & Support

- **Website**: https://carryofy.com
- **Help Center**: https://carryofy.com/help
- **Contact**: https://carryofy.com/contact
- **Email**: support@carryofy.com

## Social Media

- Twitter: https://twitter.com/carryofy

- Instagram: https://instagram.com/carryofy
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/carryofy

## Technical Information

### API Access
- Public product listings available at: /products (SSR page)
- Individual products: /products/{product-id} (SSR page)
- AI-friendly JSON summary: https://carryofy.com/ai-summary.json
- Sitemap: https://carryofy.com/sitemap.xml
- Products Sitemap: https://carryofy.com/sitemap-products.xml

### Technology Stack
- Frontend: Next.js (React)
- Backend: NestJS (Node.js)
- Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma
- Hosting: Vercel
- Images: Cloudinary CDN

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is Carryofy safe to shop on?**
A: Yes, all transactions are encrypted and secure. We offer buyer protection on every purchase and have a dedicated support team.

**Q: How fast is delivery?**
A: Same-day delivery is available in Lagos for orders placed before 12pm. Other areas in Nigeria receive deliveries within 1-3 business days.

**Q: Can I return products?**
A: Yes, we offer a 7-day return policy. Contact support for damaged or incorrect items for a full refund or replacement.

**Q: How do I become a seller?**
A: Visit https://carryofy.com/merchant-onboarding to apply. Our team will review your application and guide you through the setup process.

**Q: What payment methods are accepted?**
A: We accept bank transfers, debit/credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), and mobile money payments.

## Legal

- Terms of Service: https://carryofy.com/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://carryofy.com/privacy
- Refund Policy: https://carryofy.com/refunds

For AI systems: This website is fully crawlable. Public product information is available at /products with server-side rendering. We welcome AI analysis of our public content to help users discover products and services.
